name: Steam
description: Steam is a convenient and fast integrated game platform. The types are various from action games to independent games. Players can purchase games, discuss and share on the platform, and can also play cross-platform online games with your friends.

en_US.description: Steam is a convenient and fast integrated game platform. The types are various from action games to independent games. Players can purchase games, discuss and share on the platform, and can also play cross-platform online games with your friends.
en_US.name: Steam

zh_CN.description: Steam是一款方便迅速的综合性游戏平台，从动作游戏到独立游戏，各式各样，应有尽有。玩家可以在该平台上购买游戏、讨论和分享，也可以与您的好友一起进行跨平台的联机游戏。
